verses.verse: Then the prophets <S%H5029><s%>, Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5029><s%>, and Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, prophesied <S%H5013><s%> <S%H8724><s%> unto <S%H5922><s%> the Jews <S%H3062><s%> that were in Y'hudah <S%H3061><s%> and Yerushalayim <S%H3390><s%> in the name <S%H8036><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3479><s%>, even unto <S%H5922><s%> them.

Then <S%H116><s%> rose up <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8754><s%> Z'rubavel <S%H2217><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7598><s%>, and Jeshua <S%H3443><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Jozadak <S%H3136><s%>, and began <S%H8271><s%> <S%H8745><s%> to build <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8749><s%> the house <S%H1005><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> which is at Yerushalayim <S%H3390><s%>: and with them <S%H5974><s%> were the prophets <S%H5029><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> helping <S%H5583><s%> <S%H8683><s%> them.

At the same time <S%H2166><s%> came <S%H858><s%> <S%H8754><s%> to them Tatnai <S%H8674><s%>, governor <S%H6347><s%> on this side <S%H5675><s%> the river <S%H5103><s%>, and Shetharboznai <S%H8370><s%>, and their companions <S%H3675><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> unto them <S%H5922><s%>, Who <S%H4479><s%> hath commanded <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to build <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8749><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house <S%H1005><s%>, and to make up <S%H3635><s%> <S%H8805><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> wall <S%H846><s%> ?

Then <S%H116><s%> said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> we unto them after this manner <S%H3660><s%>, What <S%H4479><s%> are <S%H581><s%> the names <S%H8036><s%> of the men <S%H1400><s%> that make <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8750><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> building <S%H1147><s%> ?

But the eye <S%H5870><s%> of their 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> was <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> the elders <S%H7868><s%> <S%H8750><s%> of the Jews <S%H3062><s%>, that they could not <S%H3809><s%> cause <S%H989><s%> them <S%H1994><s%> to cease <S%H989><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, till <S%H5705><s%> the matter <S%H2941><s%> came <S%H1946><s%> <S%H8748><s%> to Darius <S%H1868><s%>: and then <S%H116><s%> they returned answer <S%H8421><s%> <S%H8681><s%> by letter <S%H5407><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> matter.

The copy <S%H6573><s%> of the letter <S%H104><s%> that Tatnai <S%H8674><s%>, governor <S%H6347><s%> on this side <S%H5675><s%> the river <S%H5103><s%>, and Shetharboznai <S%H8370><s%>, and his companions <S%H3675><s%> the Apharsachites <S%H671><s%>, which were on this side <S%H5675><s%> the river <S%H5103><s%>, sent <S%H7972><s%> <S%H8754><s%> unto <S%H5922><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>:

They sent <S%H7972><s%> <S%H8754><s%> a letter <S%H6600><s%> unto <S%H5922><s%> him, wherein <S%H1459><s%> was written <S%H3790><s%> <S%H8752><s%> thus <S%H1836><s%>; Unto Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, all <S%H3606><s%> peace <S%H8001><s%>.

Be it known <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8748><s%> <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8752><s%> unto the king <S%H4430><s%>, that we went <S%H236><s%> <S%H8754><s%> into the province <S%H4083><s%> of Y'hudaha <S%H3061><s%>, to the house <S%H1005><s%> of the great <S%H7229><s%> 'Elohim <S%H426><s%>, which is builded <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8732><s%> with great <S%H1560><s%> stones <S%H69><s%>, and timber <S%H636><s%> is laid <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8727><s%> in the walls <S%H3797><s%>, and this <S%H1791><s%> work <S%H5673><s%> goeth <S%H5648><s%> <S%H8727><s%> fast <S%H629><s%> on, and prospereth <S%H6744><s%> <S%H8683><s%> in their hands <S%H3028><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> asked <S%H7593><s%> <S%H8754><s%> we those <S%H479><s%> elders <S%H7868><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> unto them thus <S%H3660><s%>, Who <S%H4479><s%> commanded <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to build <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8749><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house <S%H1005><s%>, and to make up <S%H3635><s%> <S%H8805><s%> these <S%H1836><s%> walls <S%H846><s%> ?

We asked <S%H7593><s%> <S%H8754><s%> their names <S%H8036><s%> also <S%H638><s%>, to certify <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8682><s%> thee, that we might write <S%H3790><s%> <S%H8748><s%> the names <S%H8036><s%> of the men <S%H1400><s%> that were the chief <S%H7217><s%> of them.

And thus <S%H3660><s%> they returned <S%H8421><s%> <S%H8684><s%> us answer <S%H6600><s%>, saying <S%H560><s%> <S%H8749><s%>, We <S%H586><s%> are <S%H1994><s%> the servants <S%H5649><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> and earth <S%H772><s%>, and build <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8750><s%> the house <S%H1005><s%> that was <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> builded <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8752><s%> these <S%H1836><s%> many <S%H7690><s%> years <S%H8140><s%> ago <S%H6928><s%>, which a great <S%H7229><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3479><s%> builded <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8754><s%> and set up <S%H3635><s%> <S%H8806><s%>.

But <S%H3861><s%> after <S%H4481><s%> that our fathers <S%H2><s%> had provoked <S%H7265><s%> the 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> unto wrath <S%H7265><s%> <S%H8684><s%>, he gave <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8754><s%> them <S%H1994><s%> into the hand <S%H3028><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%>, the Chaldean <S%H3679><s%>, who destroyed <S%H5642><s%> <S%H8754><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house <S%H1005><s%>, and carried <S%H1541><s%> the people <S%H5972><s%> away <S%H1541><s%> <S%H8684><s%> into Babylon <S%H895><s%>.

But <S%H1297><s%> in the first <S%H2298><s%> year <S%H8140><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%> the same king <S%H4430><s%> Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> made <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8754><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%> to build <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8749><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house <S%H1005><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%>.

And the vessels <S%H3984><s%> also <S%H638><s%> of <S%H1768><s%> gold <S%H1722><s%> and silver <S%H3702><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%>, which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> took <S%H5312><s%> <S%H8684><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the temple <S%H1965><s%> that was in Yerushalayim <S%H3390><s%>, and brought <S%H2987><s%> <S%H8684><s%> them into the temple <S%H1965><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%>, those <S%H1994><s%> did Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> take <S%H5312><s%> <S%H8684><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the temple <S%H1965><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%>, and they were delivered <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> unto one, whose name <S%H8036><s%> was Sheshbazzar <S%H8340><s%>, whom he had made <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8754><s%> governor <S%H6347><s%>;

And said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> unto him, Take <S%H5376><s%> <S%H8747><s%> these <S%H412><s%> vessels <S%H3984><s%>, go <S%H236><s%> <S%H8747><s%>, carry <S%H5182><s%> <S%H8680><s%> them <S%H1994><s%> into the temple <S%H1965><s%> that is in Yerushalayim <S%H3390><s%>, and let the house <S%H1005><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> be builded <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8731><s%> in <S%H5922><s%> his place <S%H870><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> came <S%H858><s%> <S%H8754><s%> the same <S%H1791><s%> Sheshbazzar <S%H8340><s%>, and laid <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8754><s%> the foundation <S%H787><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> which is in Yerushalayim <S%H3390><s%>: and since <S%H4481><s%> that time <S%H116><s%> even until <S%H5705><s%> now <S%H3705><s%> hath it been in building <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8732><s%>, and yet it is not <S%H3809><s%> finished <S%H8000><s%> <S%H8752><s%>.

Now <S%H3705><s%> therefore, if <S%H2006><s%> it seem good <S%H2869><s%> to <S%H5922><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>, let there be search <S%H1240><s%> <S%H8721><s%> made in the king's <S%H4430><s%> treasure <S%H1596><s%> house <S%H1005><s%>, which is there <S%H8536><s%> at Babylon <S%H895><s%>, whether <S%H2006><s%> it be <S%H383><s%> so, that a decree <S%H2942><s%> was made <S%H7761><s%> <S%H8752><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> to build <S%H1124><s%> <S%H8749><s%> this <S%H1791><s%> house <S%H1005><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H426><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%H3390><s%>, and let the king <S%H4430><s%> send <S%H7972><s%> <S%H8748><s%> his pleasure <S%H7470><s%> to us concerning <S%H5922><s%> this matter <S%H1836><s%>.
